DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Supraglottic Airway Devices Endotracheal Tube During Controlled Ventilation Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: In study , compare ventilation performance i-gel endotracheal tube laparoscopic surgery . Our patient receive i-gel endotracheal tube draw . These patient Included criteria:1.ASA I-II2.Age 20-80 year old , underwent elective GYN laparoscopic surgery ability give inform consent . The exclude criterion : 1.presence significant lung , heart , brain disease 2. pathology neck upper respiratory tract 3.Potential difficult intubation 4.an increase risk aspiration , ex : gastroesophageal reflux , full stomach , Obese ( BMI > 30 ) , pregnant woman , confirm patient history medical chart . Preoxygenation maintain three minute avoid bag mask ventilation . Anesthesia induce routine medication , lidocaine„ÄÅ propofol , fentanyl cisatracurium . The i-gel endotracheal tube insert . The lung ventilate tidal volume ( 8mL/kg ) use volume control . After , want observe respiratory parameter , leak fraction , leak volume , tidal volume , peak airway pressure mean airway pressure . In hypothesis , i-gel may use reasonable alternative tracheal tube volume control ventilation laparoscopic surgery .
